9*p55448a0924*turn over     do not write in this area do not write in this area do not write in this area12 two students carry out experiments to measure the acceleration of free fall.  in each experiment a ball bearing is dropped through a known distance and the time taken is measured. student a drops the ball bearing and starts a stopwatch.  he stops the stopwatch when he sees the ball bearing reach the ground.  the stopwatch measures to the nearest 0.01 s. student b uses an electronic system that releases the ball bearing and simultaneously starts a timer.  the timer stops automatically when the ball bearing reaches a sensor.  the timer measures to the nearest 0.001 s. state and explain two reasons why the method used by student b is better for this experiment.(4)(total for question 12 = 4 marks)
